body_html:
If you make your change, the C++ AddN op will fail since it doesn't support IndexedSlices. I don't know much about IndexedSlices, but most ops do not seem to support them.

I don't know anything about word embeddings or how add_n is useful to them. /CC @ispirmustafa, can you comment?

If you make your change, the C++ AddN op will fail since it doesn't support IndexedSlices. I don't know much about IndexedSlices, but most ops do not seem to support them.

body:
If you make your change, the C++ `AddN` op will fail since it doesn't support IndexedSlices. I don't know much about IndexedSlices, but most ops do not seem to support them.

I don't know anything about word embeddings or how `add_n` is useful to them. /CC @ispirmustafa, can you comment?
